If someone commits to buy it it's theirs (even if you're thinking about it).

Thanks.

Rob

Rob

Rob

BEAUTY!!!worth every penny and more......

:)

Would also consider a trade for cards I need for sets including:

T207 Lowdermilk
T207 Mogridge
M116 Coveleskie
D322 Dreyfuss

Thanks again.

Rob
Not a t206 collector but fascinated with the story behind the cards. Just curious what makes this card so rare / expensive? Very cool.

A very well recognized Hall of Famer with a trickier to find back. For some collectors a blank back is a must when putting together a run of all back brand types. 

Additionally these were handcut from unfinished sheets and likely brought home by an employee rather then distributed in tobacco packs.  

This is also likely one of a kind or very close to it.

Thanks Chris.


Apparently not quite expensive as I thought though...

How about $3300?  Anyone?

Rob
:Dwow....wish i could pull the trigger on that sweeeeeeet card

Price lowered again to $2900.  SOLD.

Also would consider a trade/partial trade for other T206 backs or E94s.

Thanks again!

Rob

bump.
